risks.name: Digital Banking Platform Breach
risks.description: Unauthorized access to customer accounts and transaction data through digital banking channels

risks.name: Anti-Money Laundering Compliance
risks.description: Failure to detect and report suspicious transactions in accordance with AML regulations

risks.name: Credit Risk Concentration
risks.description: Excessive exposure to single counterparties or industry sectors

risks.name: Wire Transfer Fraud
risks.description: Fraudulent wire transfers initiated through social engineering or account compromise

risks.name: Core Banking System Availability
risks.description: Critical system failures affecting transaction processing and customer services

risks.name: Reputational Impact from Service Failures
risks.description: Loss of customer trust due to service disruptions or data incidents

risks.name: Insider Trading and Market Manipulation
risks.description: Risk of insider information misuse affecting market integrity

risks.name: Key Person Risk in Trading
risks.description: Dependency on specialized traders and risk of knowledge loss

risks.name: Climate Risk in Loan Portfolio
risks.description: Physical and transition risks affecting commercial real estate and infrastructure loans

risks.name: Third-Party Payment Processor Risk
risks.description: Operational and security risks from payment processing vendors

risks.name: Fintech Competition and Digital Disruption
risks.description: Loss of market share to digital-first competitors and payment platforms

risks.name: Loan Underwriting Quality
risks.description: Risk of poor credit decisions leading to elevated default rates

risks.name: Interest Rate Risk
risks.description: Exposure to adverse interest rate movements affecting net interest margin

risks.name: ATM Network Security
risks.description: Physical and cyber attacks on ATM infrastructure

risks.name: Data Privacy Regulations Compliance
risks.description: Risk of non-compliance with evolving data protection regulations across jurisdictions

controls.name: Multi-Factor Authentication System
controls.description: Enterprise-wide MFA for all digital banking and internal systems

controls.name: Data Encryption Platform
controls.description: End-to-end encryption for data at rest and in transit across all systems

controls.name: 24/7 Security Operations Center
controls.description: Round-the-clock monitoring and threat detection for cyber threats

controls.name: Core Banking System Redundancy
controls.description: Geo-redundant backup systems with automatic failover for core banking

controls.name: Fraud Detection AI System
controls.description: Machine learning-based fraud detection for transactions and account activity

controls.name: AML Transaction Monitoring
controls.description: Automated monitoring system for suspicious transaction patterns

controls.name: Vendor Risk Management Program
controls.description: Comprehensive third-party risk assessment and continuous monitoring

controls.name: Internal Audit Function
controls.description: Independent internal audit with risk-based audit planning

controls.name: Business Continuity Management
controls.description: Enterprise BCP with annual testing and crisis management protocols

controls.name: Credit Risk Analytics Platform
controls.description: Advanced analytics for credit portfolio monitoring and stress testing

controls.name: Employee Security Awareness Training
controls.description: Mandatory quarterly security training and phishing simulations

controls.name: Privileged Access Management
controls.description: Centralized management and monitoring of privileged accounts

controls.name: Regulatory Compliance Monitoring
controls.description: Automated compliance tracking and regulatory change management

standards.name: PCI DSS v4.0
standards.description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard

standards.name: FFIEC CAT
standards.description: Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council Cybersecurity Assessment Tool

standards.name: Dodd-Frank
standards.description: Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act

issues.title: Password Complexity Requirements Below Standard
issues.description: Current password policy does not enforce sufficient complexity for privileged accounts

issues.name: BCP Testing Documentation Gaps
issues.title: Business Continuity Plan Testing Incomplete
issues.description: Annual BCP testing was not performed for 3 critical business units

issues.title: Legacy Systems Without Security Patches
issues.description: 12 critical systems running unsupported software versions with known vulnerabilities

issues.title: Security Training Completion Rate Below Target
issues.description: Only 78% of employees completed mandatory quarterly security training

issues.title: Privileged Access Management Gaps
issues.description: 45 privileged accounts without proper monitoring and session recording

issues.title: Vendor Security Assessment Overdue
issues.description: Annual security assessments not completed for 8 critical payment processors

issues.title: Security Monitoring Coverage Gaps
issues.description: SOC monitoring does not cover 15% of critical infrastructure endpoints

issues.title: Customer Data Classification Inconsistent
issues.description: Data classification tags missing for 23% of customer databases

issues.title: Credit Concentration Limits Exceeded
issues.description: Exposure to commercial real estate sector exceeds established risk appetite

issues.title: API Security Vulnerabilities
issues.description: Third-party payment API integrations have authentication weaknesses

issues.title: AML Alert Investigation Backlog
issues.description: 126 AML alerts pending investigation beyond regulatory timeframe

issues.title: Disaster Recovery Testing Failures
issues.description: DR failover test for core banking system exceeded RTO by 4 hours

issues.title: Loan Documentation Quality Issues
issues.description: 15% of loan files missing required documentation per underwriting standards

issues.title: Interest Rate Hedging Gap
issues.description: Unhedged interest rate exposure exceeds established limits by $125M

incidents.title: Executive Phishing Campaign
incidents.description: Sophisticated spear-phishing targeting C-suite executives with fake wire transfer requests
incidents.impact: No financial loss - detected by security awareness

incidents.title: Mobile Banking Outage
incidents.description: Mobile banking application unavailable for 4.5 hours affecting 250k customers

incidents.title: Customer Data Exposure via Misconfigured S3 Bucket
incidents.description: Cloud storage bucket with 12k customer records publicly accessible for 6 hours

incidents.title: Ransomware Attempt Blocked
incidents.description: Ransomware payload detected in email attachment, quarantined before execution
incidents.impact: No impact - prevented by endpoint protection

incidents.title: Suspicious Wire Transfer Activity
incidents.description: Unusual pattern of wire transfers detected indicating potential account takeover

incidents.title: ATM Skimming Device Detected
incidents.description: Physical skimming device found on ATM in high-traffic branch location

incidents.title: DDoS Attack on Public Website
incidents.description: Distributed denial of service attack on customer-facing website
incidents.impact: Website slowdown for 2 hours - no data breach

incidents.title: Insider Data Access Anomaly
incidents.description: Employee accessed customer accounts outside normal job function

incidents.title: Payment Processing Failure
incidents.description: Third-party payment processor outage affecting ACH transactions
incidents.impact: Delayed ACH processing - resolved next business day
